CustomField.description:
Updated by Polytomic, and checked TRUE if the Lead record becomes linked with a Matched Contact or Account. This toggle is to prevent Apex conversion errors from occurring when a large batch of leads are created at once.
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Updated by Polytomic, and checked TRUE if the Lead record becomes linked with a Matched Contact or Account. This toggle is to prevent Apex conversion errors from occurring when a large batch of leads are created at once.
CustomField.label: Auto Conversion?
